trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Camarillo
There were no other sightings in Camarillo on or around July 5th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsMy family was outside at around 8 pm when we noticed this solid Black triangle shaped object in the sky above we observed it for about 30 min it stayed stationary it appeared to be spinning. After the 30 minutes it began moving east slowy it made no noise. Was not a ballon because it was moving against the wind and it was not and aircraft because there where planes in the sky and they looked nothing like the object. It stopped and remained stationary for about 15 min After about 45 minutes it dissapeard as the sun went down
Summary: Matte Black, no lights , stationary ,no noise,
